lines.speaker: Secretary
lines.text: Let me guess — you're here to submit everything for the scholarship?

lines.speaker: Secretary
lines.text: Let’s see... birth certificate — notarized, good. Transcript from the professor, check. CV with photo, motivation letter, printed final project… well, look at that.

lines.speaker: Secretary
lines.text: You've got it all. I’ll file this under ‘Eligible Candidates.’ Let’s hope the board’s in a good mood this year.
